summary.para: Gets a transform that maps abstract coordinates to DIPs.

param.name: transform
param.para: When this method returns, contains a structure which has transform information for pixel snapping.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of physical pixels per DIP.

param.name: pixelsPerDip
param.para: When this method returns, contains the number of physical pixels per DIP.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Because a DIP (device-independent pixel) is 1/96 inch, the pixelsPerDip value is the number of logical pixels per inch divided by 96.

summary.para: Defines the pixel snapping properties such as pixels per DIP(device-independent pixel) and the current transform matrix of a text renderer.
